test_cases.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !##############################################################################
00002 !######## Program to test Runge-Kutta IMEX schemes on various problems ########
00003 !##############################################################################
00004 !
00005 !----------------------------PROBLEM LIST--------------------------------------
00006 !     problem 1 ) van der Pol (Hairer II, pp 403)
00007 !     problem 2 ) Pureschi and Russo 
00008 !     problem 3 ) Dekker 7.5.2 pp. 215 (Kaps problem   : Index 1)
00009 !     problem 4 ) Dekker 7.5.1 pp. 214 (Kreiss' problem: Index 2)
00010 !     problem 5 ) Lorenz attractor
00011 !     problem 6 ) Rossler_Chaos (Wolf.Swift.Swinney.Vastano. Physica 16D,(1985),285-317
00012 !     problem 7 ) Oregonator
00013 !     problem 8 ) Brusselator
00014 !     problem 9 ) Burgers
00015 !     problem 10) Boscarino31 
00016 !     problem 11) Broadwell Model
00017 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00018 !
00019 !-----------------------------REQUIRED FILES-----------------------------------
00020 ! PRECISION_VARS.F90        *DEFINES PRECISION FOR ALL VARIABLES
00021 ! CONTROL_VARIABLES.F90     *CONTAINS VARIABLES AND ALLOCATION ROUTINES
00022 ! RUNGE_KUTTA.F90           *CONTAINS RK CONSTANTS
00023 ! OUTPUT_MODULE.F90         *CONTAINS ROUTINES TO OUTPUT DATA TO FILES AND TERMINAL
00024 ! STAGE_VALUE_MODULE.F90    *PREDICTS NEXT STAGE VALUES FOR NEWTON ITERATIONS
00025 ! PROBLEMSUB.F90            *DEFINES WHICH PROBLEM IS RELATED TO USER INPUT
00026 ! NEWTON.F90                *PERFORMS NEWTON ITERATION
00027 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00028 !
00029 !--------------------------HOW TO USE------------------------------------------
00030 !**Adding test cases:
00031 !     Subroutine file can be added to the directory with form of vanderpol.f90,
00032 !     etc. problemsub.f90 must be updated for the problem to be included
00033 !**Compiling
00034 !     Compile all files listed above together in the same directory
00035 !**Running test cases
00036 !     Program will prompt user for which predictor, case, and problem
00037 !     to run.
00038 !**Output results
00039 !     The program outputs results to files with the form:
00040 ! /"probname"/"casename"/"probname"_"casename"_"variable number".dat
00041 ! /"probname"/"casename"/"probname"_"casename"_"variable number"P.dat
00042 ! /"probname"/"casename"/"probname"_"casename"_conv.dat
00043 !********************************BEGIN PROGRAM*********************************
00044       program test_cases
00045 
00046       use precision_vars,     only: wp
00047       use output_module,      only: create_file_paths, output_names,          & 
00048      &                              init_output_files, output_conv_stiff,     &
00049      &                              output_terminal_iteration,                &
00050      &                              output_terminal_final,output_conv_error
00051       use Stage_value_module, only: Stage_Value_Predictor,xnorm
00052       use control_variables,  only: allocate_vars,deallocate_vars,isamp,jmax, &
00053      &                              uveco,errvec,errvecT,tmpvec,resE,resI,    &
00054      &                              error,errorP,b1save,b1Psave,ustage,       &
00055      &                              predvec,jactual,uvec,uexact,b,usum,       &
00056      &                              programstep,errorL2,b1L2save
00057       use runge_kutta,        only: aE,aI,bE,bI,bEH,bIH,cI,is,ns,rungeadd
00058       use Newton,             only: Newton_Iteration
00059       use problemsub_mod,     only: problemsub
00060 
00061       implicit none     
00062 !-----------------------------VARIABLES----------------------------------------  
00063       !internal variables
00064       real(wp)                              :: itmp,t,dto,tt,cputime1,cputime2
00065       real(wp), dimension(jmax)             :: epsave
00066      
00067       integer            :: ipred,problem,cases                   !user inputs     
00068       integer            :: icase,i,iprob,jepsil,iDT,k,ktime,L,LL !do loops
00069       integer            :: icount,jcount                         !counters                     
00070       
00071       !problemsub variables
00072       real(wp)                              :: ep,dt,tfinal 
00073       integer                               :: nveclen
00074 
00075       !data out variables
00076       real(wp), dimension(isamp)            :: cost         
00077       real(wp), dimension(is)               :: stageE,stageI,maxiter
00078       
00079 !      real(wp),dimension(40) :: tmpv
00080                           
00081 !-----------------------------USER INPUT---------------------------------------
00082       write(*,*)'what is ipred?' !input predictor number
00083       read(*,*)ipred
00084       write(*,*)'what is case?'  !input range of runge kutta cases
00085       read(*,*)cases
00086       write(*,*)'which problem?' !input problem number
00087       read(*,*)problem
00088 !-------------------------ALGORITHMS LOOP--------------------------------------  
00089       do icase = cases,cases
00090   
00091         !**initilizations?**
00092         stageE(:) = 0.0_wp
00093         stageI(:) = 0.0_wp
00094         maxiter(:)= 0
00095         icount = 0                                  !cost counters
00096         jcount = 0                                  !cost counters
00097         
00098         !**GET RK COEFFICIENTS**
00099         call rungeadd(icase)
00100 
00101 !--------------------------PROBLEMS LOOP---------------------------------------
00102         do iprob = problem,problem
00103         
00104           call cpu_time(cputime1)
00105               
00106           !**CALL FOR PROBNAME & NVECLEN**
00107           programStep='INITIALIZE_PROBLEM_INFORMATION'
00108           call problemsub(iprob,nveclen,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,tt,aI(1,1),1)
00109         
00110           call allocate_vars(nveclen,is) 
00111                                       
00112           !**INIT. FILE PATH FOR OUTPUTS**
00113           call create_file_paths
00114           call output_names                           
00115 
00116 !--------------------------STIFFNESS LOOP--------------------------------------
00117           do jepsil = 1,jactual,1     
00118                                  
00119             itmp = 11 - jmax/jactual         !used for 81 values of ep
00120             ep = 1.0_wp/10**((jepsil-1)/(itmp*1.0_wp))           
00121             
00122             !**INIT. OUTPUT FILES**
00123             call init_output_files(nveclen,ep)
00124 
00125 !--------------------------TIMESTEP LOOP----------------------------------------
00126 ! HACK
00127 !           do iDT = isamp,isamp,1         !  use this loop to set exact solution
00128             cost(:)=0.0_wp !turn this on when doing 1 iDT value
00129 !            do iDT = 1,2
00130 ! HACK
00131             do iDT =1,isamp,1   
00132 
00133 
00134               !**INITIALIZE PROBLEM INFORMATION**
00135               programStep='SET_INITIAL_CONDITIONS'
00136               call problemsub(iprob,nveclen,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,tt,aI(1,1),1)  
00137 
00138               dto = dt        !store time step
00139               t = 0.0_wp      !init. start time
00140 
00141               !**INIT. ERROR VECTOR**
00142               errvecT(:) = 0.0_wp
00143         
00144               do i = 1,ns            !initialize stage value preditor
00145                 predvec(:,i) = uvec(:)
00146               enddo
00147 !--------------------------TIME ADVANCEMENT LOOP-------------------------------
00148               do ktime = 1,100000000
00149                 if(t+dt > tfinal)dt = tfinal-t+1.0e-11_wp !check if dt>tfinal
00150                 tt=t+Ci(1)*dt
00151                 !**STORE VALUES OF UVEC**
00152                 uveco(:) = uvec(:)
00153              
00154                 jcount = jcount + (ns-1)    !keep track of total RK stages  
00155 !--------------------------------RK LOOP---------------------------------------
00156                 programStep='BUILD_RHS'
00157                 call problemsub(iprob,nveclen,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,tt,aI(1,1),1) 
00158 
00159                 ustage(:,1) = uvec(:)
00160 
00161                 !  ESDIRK Loop
00162                 do L = 2,ns                        
00163                 tt=t+Ci(L)*dt
00164 
00165                   usum(:) = uveco(:)
00166                   do LL = 1,L-1 
00167                     usum(:) = usum(:)+ aI(L,LL)*resI(:,LL)+ aE(L,LL)*resE(:,LL)                               
00168                   enddo
00169               
00170                   if(ipred==2) predvec(:,L)=uvec(:)!previous guess as starter
00171                   if(ipred/=2) uvec(:) = predvec(:,L)  
00172 !---------------BEG NEWTON ITERATION ------------------------------------------
00173                   call Newton_Iteration(iprob,L,ep,dt,nveclen,&
00174      &                                      tt,aI(L,L),icount,k)
00175 !---------------END NEWTON ITERATION-------------------------------------------
00176                   ustage(:,L) = uvec(:)     !  Save the solution at each stage
00177                  
00178                   ! Fill in resE and resI with the converged data
00179                   programStep='BUILD_RHS'
00180                   call problemsub(iprob,nveclen,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,tt,aI(1,1),L)
00181 
00182                   if(ipred/=2)call Stage_Value_Predictor(ipred,L,ktime)
00183 
00184                   if((k > maxiter(L)).and.(ktime/=1)) maxiter(L) = k
00185 
00186                   stageE(L) = stageE(L) + xnorm(uvec,predvec(:,L))
00187                   stageI(L) = stageI(L) + 1.0_wp*k
00188 
00189                   if(ipred==2)call Stage_Value_Predictor(ipred,L,ktime)
00190                 enddo
00191 !-----------------------------END of A_{k,j} portion of RK LOOP----------------
00192      
00193                 uvec(:) = uveco(:)
00194                 do LL = 1,ns 
00195                   uvec(:) = uvec(:) + bI(LL)*resI(:,LL)+bE(LL)*resE(:,LL)
00196                 enddo
00197 !-----------------------Final Sum of RK loop using the b_{j}-------------------
00198 
00199                 ! ERROR ESTIMATE
00200                 if(t <= tfinal-1.0e-11_wp)then               
00201                   errvec(:) = 0.0_wp
00202                   do LL = 1,ns 
00203                     errvec(:) = errvec(:) + (bE(LL)-bEH(LL))*resE(:,LL) &
00204      &                                    + (bI(LL)-bIH(LL))*resI(:,LL)
00205 
00206                   enddo
00207                   errvec(:) = abs(errvec(:))
00208                 endif               
00209   
00210                 errvecT(:) = errvecT(:) + errvec(:)
00211 
00212                 t = t + dt                  !increment time
00213 ! HACK - time depentent solution
00214 !                write(843,*)t,uvec(1:nveclen:2)
00215 !                write(844,*)t,uvec(2:nveclen+1:2)
00216 ! HACK  
00217 !                print*,t,iDT,ep
00218                 if(t >= tfinal) exit        
00219 ! HACK
00220 ! L2 norm and Linf norms                
00221 !                print*,'u- errorL2',sqrt(dot_product(errvec(1:nveclen:2),errvec(1:nveclen:2))/(nveclen/2))
00222 !                print*,'u- errorLinf',maxval(errvec(1:nveclen:2))
00223 !                print*,'v- errorL2',sqrt(dot_product(errvec(2:nveclen:2),errvec(2:nveclen:2))/(nveclen/2))
00224 !                print*,'v- errorLinf',maxval(errvec(2:nveclen:2))
00225 ! HACK
00226               enddo                                                     
00227 !-----------------------END TIME ADVANCEMENT LOOP------------------------------
00228 ! HACK exact solution for each dt
00229 !              write(120+iDT,*)uvec
00230 !              print*,iDT
00231 ! HACK
00232 ! L2 norm and Linf norms          
00233 !                tmpv=abs(uexact-uvec     )
00234 !                print*,'u- L2',sqrt(dot_product(tmpv(1:nveclen:2),&
00235 !     &                            tmpv(1:nveclen:2))/(nveclen/2))
00236 !                print*,'u- Linf',maxval(uexact(1:nveclen:2))
00237 !                print*,'v- L2',sqrt(dot_product(tmpv(2:nveclen:2),&
00238 !     &                            tmpv(2:nveclen:2))/(nveclen/2))
00239 !                print*,'v- Linf',maxval(uexact(2:nveclen:2))
00240 ! HACK              
00241      
00242               cost(iDT) = log10((ns-1)/dto)    !  ns - 1 implicit stages
00243               
00244               call output_conv_error(cost(iDT))
00245               
00246               tmpvec(:) = abs(uvec(:)-uexact(:))
00247 
00248               do i = 1,nvecLen
00249                 if(tmpvec(i) == 0.0_wp)tmpvec(i)=1.0e-15_wp
00250               enddo
00251               error(iDT,:)  = log10(tmpvec(:))
00252               errorP(iDT,:) = log10(errvecT(:))
00253               errorL2(iDT,1)= log10(sqrt(dot_product(tmpvec(1:nveclen:2),tmpvec(1:nveclen:2))/(nveclen/2)))
00254               errorL2(iDT,2)= log10(sqrt(dot_product(tmpvec(2:nveclen:2),tmpvec(2:nveclen:2))/(nveclen/2)))
00255             enddo  
00256 !----------------------------END TIMESTEP LOOP---------------------------------
00257 !  HACK used to write exact solution
00258 !           write(*,*)'writing exact solution'
00259 !           write(122,*)uvec(1:nveclen:2)
00260 !           write(123,*)uvec(2:nveclen:2)
00261 !           write(121,*)uexact
00262 !           write(125,*)uvec
00263 !  HACK used to write exact solution
00264 !----------------------------OUTPUTS-------------------------------------------
00265 
00266             call output_terminal_iteration(cost,0,ep,nveclen)
00267 
00268             epsave(jepsil) = log10(ep)
00269             do i = 1,nveclen
00270               b1save(jepsil,i) = -b(i)
00271               b1Psave(jepsil,i) = -b(i+nveclen)
00272             enddo
00273             do i=1,2
00274             b1L2save(jepsil,i) = -b(2*nveclen+i)
00275             enddo
00276             
00277           enddo      
00278 !---------------------END STIFFNESS LOOP---------------------------------------
00279           !**OUTPUT CONVERGENCE VS STIFFNESS**
00280           call output_conv_stiff(nveclen,epsave)
00281           
00282           !**OUTPUT TO TERMINAL**
00283           call output_terminal_final(icount,jcount,stageE,stageI,maxiter)
00284           
00285           call cpu_time(cputime2)
00286           write(*,*)'Total time elapsed for this case: ',cputime2-cputime1,'sec'  
00287 
00288 !----------------------END OUTPUTS---------------------------------------------
00289           call deallocate_vars
00290         enddo                                       
00291 !----------------------END PROBLEMS LOOP---------------------------------------
00292       enddo                                 
00293 !----------------------END ALGORITHMS LOOP-------------------------------------
00294 !----------------------END PROGRAM---------------------------------------------
00295       END PROGRAM test_cases
